ALBench.skeleton.dataset_skeleton.ALDataset#

class ALBench.skeleton.dataset_skeleton.ALDataset(train_dataset, val_dataset, test_dataset, train_labels, val_labels, test_labels, label_type, num_classes)#

Bases: object

Dataset for active learning. The dataset contains all of training, validation and testing data as well as their embeddings. The dataset also tracks the examples that have been labeled.

__init__(train_dataset, val_dataset, test_dataset, train_labels, val_labels, test_labels, label_type, num_classes)#
Parameters:

  • train_dataset (torch.utils.data.Dataset) – Training dataset that contains both examples and labels.

  • val_dataset (torch.utils.data.Dataset) – Validation dataset that contains both examples and labels.

  • test_dataset (torch.utils.data.Dataset) – Testing dataset that contains both examples and labels.

  • train_labels (Optional[numpy.ndarray]) – All training labels for easy accessibility.

  • val_labels (Optional[numpy.ndarray]) – All validation labels for easy accessibility.

  • test_labels (Optional[numpy.ndarray]) – All testing labels for easy accessibility.

  • label_type (LabelType) – Type of labels.

  • num_classes (int) – Number of classes of the dataset.

Methods

__init__(train_dataset, val_dataset, ...)

param torch.utils.data.Dataset train_dataset:

Training dataset that contains both examples and labels.

get_embedding_datasets()

Construct PyTorch datasets of (embedding, label) pairs for all of training, validation and testing.

get_input_datasets()

Retrieves PyTorch datasets of (raw data, label) pairs for all of training, validation and testing.

labeled_idxs()

Indexes of the labeled examples in chronological order.

num_labeled()

Number of labeled examples in the pool.

update_emb(train_emb, val_emb, test_emb)

Update with the latest feature embeddings.

update_labeled_idxs(new_idxs)

Insert the examples that have been newly labeled to update the dataset tracker.
get_embedding_datasets()#

Construct PyTorch datasets of (embedding, label) pairs for all of training, validation and testing. :return: three PyTorch datasets for training, validation and testing respectively.

get_input_datasets()#

Retrieves PyTorch datasets of (raw data, label) pairs for all of training, validation and testing. :return: three PyTorch datasets for training, validation and testing respectively.

labeled_idxs()#

Indexes of the labeled examples in chronological order.

num_labeled()#

Number of labeled examples in the pool.

update_emb(train_emb, val_emb, test_emb)#

Update with the latest feature embeddings.

Parameters:

  • train_emb (numpy.ndarray) – Embeddings of training examples.

  • val_emb (numpy.ndarray) – Embeddings of validation examples.

  • test_emb (numpy.ndarray) – Embeddings of testing examples.

Returns:

update_labeled_idxs(new_idxs)#

Insert the examples that have been newly labeled to update the dataset tracker.

Parameters:

new_idxs (List) – list of newly labeled indexes.
